name: Foxfire Ooze
speed: walk 20 ft., climb 20 ft., swim 20 ft., fly 10 ft.
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

trait.name: Ambusher
text: The ooze has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Lightning Storm
text: A creature that touches the ooze while wearing metal or hits it with a melee attack with a metal weapon takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and triggers a lightning storm. All creatures within 20 feet of the ooze that are holding or wearing metal must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
text: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The foxfire ooze makes three pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.
